clues.text: Hal-oh!  Heidi Klum was born on June 1, 1973 in this country

rounds.category: OH, WHAT A TANGLED WEBSITE WE WEAVE

clues.text: The 2 clickable buttons on the front page of this site are "Search" & "I'm Feeling Lucky"; well, do ya, punk?

Carchemish was a Hittite one of these hyphenated sovereign areas, like Sparta

The month named in 44 B.C.
